work.name: Bosch China
work.summary: Deep Learning-based Gesture Recognition Algorithm Development
highlights: Developed gesture recognition algorithms for Human-Vehicle Interaction using DNN.
Applied the attention network to the neural network for dynamic gesture classification.
Achieved 90% accuracy for 16 static gestures and 9 dynamic gestures on webcam with 720p@30fps.

publications.name: Hierarchical Conversational Preference Elicitation with Bandit Feedback
publications.publisher: Conference on Information and Knowledge Management 2022 (CIKM 2022)
publications.summary: This research proposed a hierarchical structure for the traditional UCB (Upper Confidence Bound) method. Meanwhile, sufficient mathematical proofs and extensive experiments have verified the hierarchical UCB as an improved algorithm.
